Package com.example.event_app.activities.admin

package com.example.event_app.activities.admin
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminBrowseEventsActivity
    AdminBrowseEventsActivity - Admin can view, search, filter, and sort all events US 03.04.01: Browse all events Features: - Search by event name or organizer - Filter by status (All, Active, Inactive, Completed) - Sort by date, name, or entrant count - Display: event name, organizer, date, status, entrant count
    AdminBrowseImagesActivity
    AdminBrowseImagesActivity - Admin can view and delete uploaded images US 03.06.01: As an administrator, I want to browse images uploaded by users US 03.03.01: As an administrator, I want to remove uploaded images
    AdminBrowseUsersActivity
    AdminBrowseUsersActivity - Complete with search and event viewing US 03.05.01: Browse all profiles US 03.02.01: Remove profiles US 03.07.01: Remove organizers violating policy
    AdminEventDetailsActivity
    AdminEventDetailsActivity - Shows detailed event information with delete option US 03.01.01: Remove events US 03.04.01: Browse events (detailed view)
    AdminGeolocationAuditActivity
    AdminGeolocationAuditActivity - Admin audit of geolocation usage For privacy compliance monitoring
    AdminHomeActivity
    AdminHomeActivity - Admin dashboard with moderation tools and statistics Features: - Platform statistics (events, users, organizers) - Browse/manage events, users, images - Generate platform reports - Switch back to entrant/organizer view - Flagged content monitoring - Geolocation audit for privacy compliance - Notification logs for compliance tracking - Notification templates management US 03.04.01: Browse events US 03.05.01: Browse profiles US 03.06.01: Browse images US 03.13.01: Export platform usage reports UPDATED: Added geolocation audit, notification logs, and notification templates buttons
    AdminNotificationLogsActivity
    AdminNotificationLogsActivity - Admin review of all notification logs US 03.08.01: Review logs of all notifications sent by organizers
    AdminNotificationTemplatesActivity
    AdminNotificationTemplatesActivity - Manage notification templates Allows admins to create, edit, and manage notification templates used across the app
